original_title: White Zombie: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
overview: "Let Sleeping Corpses Lie" is a career-spanning five-disc box-set of the band White Zombie. The set contains a remaster of every album and E.P. released officially by White Zombie from 1985 to 1996, including six non-album songs, on four CDs and a DVD containing all nine of the band's music videos along with ten live performances.
title: White Zombie: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
